body: Where is English subs for this manga? I want to read it right now
To date, Chapters 1 to 6 have been translated to English by Lunatic Translations. Sixteen months later, nothing further. That will have to be taken care of, some day  - MWAH-HAH-HAH-HAH-HAH!
Where is English subs for this manga? I want to read it right now
